sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it is given that
\[
	\frac{t ^3 + 3 tu ^2 }{3t ^2 u + u ^3 } = \frac{m ^3 + 3 mn ^2}{3 m ^2 n + n ^3}
\]
Then prove that 
\[
	\frac{m }{t } = \frac{n }{u }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that
\[
	\frac{t ^3 + 3 tu ^2 }{3t ^2 u + u ^3 } = \frac{m ^3 + 3 mn ^2}{3 m ^2 n + n ^3}
\]
By using componendo and dividendo rule on both sides of the equation, we get
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{t ^3 + 3 tu ^2 + 3t ^2 u + u ^3 }{t ^3 + 3 tu ^2 - 3t ^2 u - u ^3 } = \\
	\frac{m ^3 + 3 mn ^2 + 3 m ^2 n + n ^3}{m ^3 + 3 mn ^2 - 3 m ^2 n - n ^3} 
\end{multline}
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{(t + u )^3}{(t - u )^3} = \frac{(m + n )^3}{(m - n )^3}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{t + u }{t - u } = \frac{m + n }{m - n }
\]
Now apply componendo and dividendo on both sides of the equation again.
\[
	\frac{t }{u } = \frac{m }{n }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{m }{t } = \frac{n }{u }
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}]
